channel.title: AI-dangers on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in AI-dangers on Bodacious Blog

item.title: GPT-3 for working out what is better than what (Aggressive humor and satire)
item.description: Warning. This is Aggressive humor and Satire It showcases GPT-3’s amazing ability but also is meant to alert you to its dangers. Summary I use GPT-3 to help Callum to understand why Age of Empires is better than Warcraft 3 AAC is better music format than MP3 Men are better than woman Mac is better than PC Terran are better than Protos The Red Hot Chili Peppers are not a very good band Powderfinger is the greatest band in the world Sensory deprivation is more ethical than battery farming of chickens.
